description:
From quick trips to the farmer’s market, to your next pedal-powered picnic, this bike basket is easy to take on and off your bike and has room for lots of treats.

  • Foam covered carry handles are easy on the hands
  • Foam covered handlebar bracket is easy on your bike
  • Quick-release bracket offers tool-free mounting and unmounting
  • Fine mesh bottom won’t let berries slip away
  • Durable powder coated steel construction
  • Dimensions: 25 x 35 x 22 cm
name: 49N St. Lawrence Basket
